description.en: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the twelfth Lunar Year. The twelfth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Pig.
description.ar: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the twelfth Lunar Year. The twelfth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Pig.
description.br: Uma capa lindamente trabalhada e adornada com um símbolo que representa o décimo segundo Ano Lunar. O décimo segundo Ano Lunar é dedicado ao Porco.
description.cns: 一件做工精美的披风。披风的图案展示的是第十二地支戌，该年的生肖为猪。
description.de: Trägt das Symbol zum Jahr des Schweins aus dem chinesischen Tierkreiszeichen. Erhöht die Intelligenz und Ausdauer um vier.
description.fi: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the twelfth Lunar Year. The twelfth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Pig.
description.fil: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the twelfth Lunar Year. The twelfth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Pig.
description.fr: Une Cape magnifiquement conçue, ornée d'un symbole qui représente la douzième Année Lunaire. La douzième Année Lunaire est dédiée au Cochon.
description.id: Cloak yang dibuat dengan indah dihiasi dengan simbol yang mewakili Tahun Imlek kedua belas. Tahun Imlek kedua belas didedikasikan untuk the Pig.
description.it: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the twelfth Lunar Year. The twelfth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Pig.
description.jp: 12月の年を表すシンボルで飾られた美しく細工されたマント。旧正月の12年目は亥に捧げられます。
description.kr: 음력 12 년을 상징하는 상징이 장식 된 아름답게 제작 된 망토. 음력 12 년은 돼지에게 바쳐집니다.
description.nl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the twelfth Lunar Year. The twelfth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Pig.
description.pl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the twelfth Lunar Year. The twelfth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Pig.
description.ru: Красивый плащ с символом двенадцатого года китайского календаря - свиньей.
description.sp: Una capa bellamente elaborada adornada con un símbolo que representa el duodécimo Año Lunar. El duodécimo Año Lunar está dedicado al Cerdo.
description.sw: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the twelfth Lunar Year. The twelfth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Pig.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมที่ประดิษฐ์ขึ้นอย่างสวยงามประดับด้วยสัญลักษณ์ที่แสดงถึงปีจันทรคติที่สิบสอง ปีจันทรคติที่สิบสองอุทิศให้กับหมู
description.tw: 象徵農曆生肖豬年的斗篷
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng được làm thủ công đẹp mắt được trang trí bằng biểu tượng tượng trưng cho Tết Nguyên đán thứ mười hai. Tháng mười hai Âm lịch dành riêng cho Kỷ Hợi.
